articles.title: Great apes at the San Diego Zoo receive a Covid-19 vaccine for animals
articles.description: Several great apes at the San Diego Zoo have been vaccinated against Covid-19 a few weeks after the zoo's gorillas tested positive for the virus.

articles.title: Latina councilwoman's accent mocked during video call

articles.description: The Citi Diamond Preferred can help you pay down your debt with an introductory balance transfer offer that lasts for an impressive 18 months, but its lack of rewards makes it a credit card that's best for people getting their finances in order.

articles.title: Omar: We're sending money to less people than Trump did
articles.description: In an interview with CNN's Brianna Keilar, Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-MN) said that Trump's stimulus package did more for Americans because President Biden's slimmed-down Covid-19 relief package has an income cap for stimulus payments.

articles.description: NASA provides an update on Perseverance rover's "firsts" and milestones so far, as well as what's next.

articles.title: White House warns of 'active threat' from Microsoft email hackers

articles.title: Appeals court orders trial court to reconsider third-degree murder charge against Derek Chauvin in George Floyd's death
articles.description: The Minnesota Court of Appeals ruled Friday that a lower court should reconsider the state's motion to reinstate a third-degree murder charge against former Minneapolis Police Officer Derek Chauvin in the death of George Floyd.

articles.description: Sen. Joe Manchin (D-WV) has stalled progress on President Biden's $1.9 trillion Covid-19 relief bill over unemployment benefits. CNN's Manu Raju reports.

articles.title: US and EU agree to suspend tariffs linked to long-running Boeing-Airbus dispute
